name: Corona Virus Invasion
description:
Our Hero Supposed to Stay Safe At Home But he Felt bored and went out and

( Bang) .... There is Corona Virus Invasion And now He Can't Escape Can You Make Him Survive? Or He Will Get Sick?

Let's See ^ _ ^

Have Fun .......

And Please Report Any Bugs And If you have creative ideas To Make This Game Better Tell Me :)
